name: inContactWeb
description: Extracts InContact metrics for web servers from Windows Performance Counters

paramSchema.title: Delay
paramSchema.name: delay
paramSchema.description: Amount of time in milliseconds to wait between collection of Windows performance counters

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the metrics data.  It will default to the hostname of the server
